verse.name: c1a
verse.lines:
Constantly abiding,
Jesus is mine;
Constantly abiding,
rapture divine

verse.name: c1b
verse.lines:
He never leaves me lonely,
whispers oh, so kind:
I will never leave thee,
Jesus is mine.

verse.name: v1a
verse.lines:
There’s a peace in my heart
that the world never gave,
A peace
it cannot take away.

verse.name: v1b
verse.lines:
Tho’ the trials of life
may surround like a cloud,
I’ve a peace that has come there to stay!

verse.name: v2a
verse.lines:
All the world seemed to sing of a Saviour and King
When peace sweetly came to my heart;

verse.name: v2b
verse.lines:
Troubles all fled away
and my night turned today.
Blessed Jesus,
how glorious Thou art!

verse.name: v3a
verse.lines:
This treasure I have
in a temple of clay,
While here on His
foot-stool I roam;

verse.name: v3b
verse.lines:
But His coming to take me some glorious day
Over there
to my heavenly home!
